title: Configure member server VMs
description: Performs base configurations on member servers: joins the specified domain, turns off IE advanced security, enables downloads from IE, then creates a custom Startup shortcut for bginfo from Sysinternals (by Mark Russinovich). Uses a custom config file (.bgi) co-located with bginfo.exe. IMPORTANT: This requires that the Sysinternals Artifact has been run first!

username.description: User name to use for domain join.

password.description: Password to use for domain join.
